title: Oceania's overwhelming toxicity

embed.description: reddit: the front page of the internet

body: Just my thoughts on the topic; please check it out and so some Rioter can give us an adequate response regarding this game/regions' lack of punishment and control over toxicity.

replies.body:
Didn't even read what he said apart from the title and I fully agree with you.
Now lets read what this Summoner said.
why not just post it on boards instead of leddit?
DW... they made a post on it the other day. The new punishment thing.
